page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content: MY FAMILY My family includes my parents,two elder brothers and me. We live in Five Ashes but prefer to use Buxted School. My Dad works for himself as a farrier and Mum helps at Pound Green Stores. We will go to Secondary School at Heathfield. My family has lived in the area for three generations and all came to this school. My father is a mobile washing machine engineer and Mum and sister work part time in the village . My Mum There are four in our family.We ame down to Buxted last year from Scotland.My dad is an airline pilot based at Gatwick Airport.I don't like moving as it takes a long time to make friends.
